abstract: On a low-rated Thursday of summer television, Fox came away as the most watched network thanks to its game show “Are You Smarter Than a Fifth Grader?” followed by a results edition of “So You Think You Can Dance.”
snippet: On a low-rated Thursday of summer television, Fox came away as the most watched network thanks to its game show “Are You Smarter Than a Fifth Grader?” followed by a results edition of “So You Think You Can Dance.”
lead_paragraph: On a low-rated Thursday of summer television, Fox came away as the most watched network thanks to its game show “Are You Smarter Than a Fifth Grader?” followed by a results edition of “So You Think You Can Dance.” Winning the 8 and 9 p.m. time slots, respectively, the Fox duo drew 7.8 million and 8.8 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
